row.process:
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" @echo off : ENDIF
!-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.COMMON_LOGGING : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Issue ID or Key" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Attachment" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_ATTACHMENT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
! Action name : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "AddAttachmentAction"
! Build java arguments : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD
! Issue ID or Key : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ISSUE_ID_KEY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -issueIdKey &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Delete sub-tasks : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_JIRA_ATTACHMENT# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#, " -file &UC4RB_JIRA_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Logging the java command to be invoked : PRINT "Prepared Command : &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD#"
! Password is decrypted and sent to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_JIRA_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! Set Execution Environment : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN
! Invoking java binary : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "%UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%" : CASE "UNIX" &UC4RB_JIRA_CMD# -password "$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD" : OTHER : ENDSWITCH
! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** ADD ATTACHMENT ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** ADD ATTACHMENT ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
